This page contains an outline of the topics, content, and assignments for the quarter.

```{r, echo = FALSE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(gt)
library(gtExtras)
library(lubridate)

agenda_final <- read_csv("documents/agenda_final.csv") %>% 
  select(-c(due_ymd, date_ymd, callout, agenda1, agenda2, agenda3, agenda4, reading_hw)) %>% 
  mutate(Week = as.character(Week))

agenda_final[is.na(agenda_final)] <- " " 

agenda_final %>% 
  mutate(Slides = map(Slides, glue::glue), 
         Activity = map(Activity, glue::glue),
         submit_act = map(submit_act, glue::glue),
         Tutorial = map(Tutorial, glue::glue),
         Project = map(Project, glue::glue)) %>% 
  gt() %>% 
  cols_move_to_start(
    columns = Week) %>% 
  fmt_markdown(columns = c(Week, Reading, Slides, Activity, submit_act, Tutorial, Project) ) %>% 
  gt_theme_espn() %>% 
  tab_options(table.width = pct(100),
              table_body.hlines.color = "#4E2A84",
              column_labels.background.color = "#4E2A84",
             row_group.background.color = "#D8D6D6")  %>% 
  tab_spanner(
    label = "Prepare",
    columns = c(Reading)
  ) %>% 
  tab_spanner(
    label = "Agenda",
    columns = c(Slides, Activity)
  ) %>% 
  tab_spanner(
    label = "Homework",
    columns = c(submit_act, Tutorial, Project, due)
  ) 
```
